title: Antigonish
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Tom Daly and Stanley Jackson
brief_description: From places far distant, students come to this quiet Nova Scotia town to study the cooperative movement and to learn skills they can take back to their own countries. At St. Francis Xavier University, Antigonish, this film shows the work of the Coady International Institute.
